name: The Fallen Church
description:
The Fallen Church is a narrative exploration game that revolves around the resolution of a mistery with a destroyed church and some strange neighbours that recently came to restore the disaster.

  • Talk with the population to get to the end of the matter.
  • Resolve puzzles and walk through the most dark corners of your mind.
  • The scenary will be changing, your sanity may be in danger.

Hope you enjoy the game. This game was made as a task for the design subject of my master's degree.
